flawed_nl_solution:
Stan needs to write 20000 words because 5 x 400 = <<5*400=20000>>20000
This will take him 400.0 minutes because 20000 / 50 = <<20000/50=400.0>>400.0
He drinks 0.25 an ounce per minute because 15 / 60 = 0.25
He will drink 100.0 ounces of water while writing the paper because 400.0 x (0.25) = <<400.0*0.25=100.0>>100.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2000, not 20000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
